content.value:
Dear participant,

Congratulations! You are registered to Neuromatch Conference 4 (NMC4). Please stay tune for the full agenda on conference.neuromatch.io. We are looking forward to see you on December 1-2, 2021.

Best,
NMC Organizers

personalizations.subject: Submitted abstract to Neuromatch Conference in a box [demo]

content.value:
Dear participant,

Thank you for submitting your abstract to Neuromatch Conference 4 (NMC4). We look forward to have you in the conference. We will send you a confirmation email a few days after the deadline..

Best,
NMC Organizers

personalizations.subject: Your mind-match at Neuromatch Conference is ready [demo]

content.value:
Dear participant,

We have matched you to 6 more participants at the conference. Please log-in and check your match at https://neuromatch.io/your-matches. You can see the instructions how to start your conversation with your peers on https://conference.neuromatch.io/instructions/how-to-register.

Best,
NMC Organizers
